summary: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.
cast: Jet Li|Michelle Yeoh|Siu-Ho Chin|Fennie Yuen|Cheung-Yan Yuen|Shun Lau|Hai Yu|Kam Kong Chow|Yung-Chang Ho|Jiankui Sun|Bing Lei Li
director: Director: Woo-Ping Yuen (as Yuen Woo Ping)
title: Tai-Chi Master
